special_programs: Tweetalig Onderwijs (TTO) - Bilingual education with Cambridge certification
DigiTech - 4 hours weekly covering AI, GameTech, Robotics, and Ethical Hacking
Blended Learning - Combination of textbooks and laptop-based differentiated instruction
Gymnasium program - Oldest gymnasium in Nieuw-West (65+ years)
Profile options: C&M, E&M, N+G, N+T (HAVO/VWO)
MAVO profiles: Techniek, Zorg & Welzijn, Economie

facilities.classrooms_labs_quality: Blended learning environment with laptop integration

technology.digital_learning: Magister portal for teachers, parents, and students
technology.description: beamers of smartboard in elk lokaal, computerlokalen

student_support.counseling: Psychological and social-emotional counseling with external referrals when needed
student_support.mentorship: Individual guidance through mentors and deans
special_education: Remedial instruction for dyslexia and dyscalculia
leerlingbegeleider (zonodig contact met ouders in Arabisch)

safety_measures: Strict absence monitoring - DUO reporting after 16 unexcused hours in 4 weeks
environment.parent_involvement: Parent reporting through Magister app, email, or phone
environment.culture_values: Views school as a place for growth where students discover their potential and talents through encouragement and challenge. Protestant foundation with focus on personal development.

public_transport.accessibility_info: metro 50 en 51 halte Postjesweg of Lelylaan, tram 1 en 17, bus 18 en 63 halte Johan Huizingalaan

awards: Oldest gymnasium in Nieuw-West (65+ years established)

admission_info: Voorrangsregels: voorrang voor leerlingen die uitstromen uit de Koplas op HLW

strengths: Comprehensive educational range from MAVO to Gymnasium
Innovative DigiTech program covering AI, GameTech, Robotics, and Ethical Hacking
Bilingual TTO program with Cambridge certification and international exchanges
Historic gymnasium program (65+ years) - oldest in Nieuw-West
Strong student support with remedial instruction and trajectklas
Modern blended learning approach with laptop integration
considerations: Located in Amsterdam Nieuw-West, requiring commute from Amstelveen
Protestant affiliation may be important factor for some families
Multiple educational tracks may mean less focus on VWO-only compared to categoraal schools
best_fit_for: Students interested in technology and innovation (DigiTech program)
Students seeking bilingual education with international experience
Students who benefit from comprehensive support systems
Those interested in classical education through Gymnasium track
Students wanting modern blended learning environment
ai_analysis.summary: Hervormd Lyceum West is a comprehensive Protestant secondary school in Amsterdam Nieuw-West offering education from MAVO through Gymnasium. With its innovative DigiTech program, bilingual TTO track, and historic gymnasium program (65+ years), HLW combines traditional values with modern educational approaches. The school emphasizes personal growth and provides strong student support including remedial instruction and trajectklas. Its blended learning environment integrates technology while maintaining focus on individual development.
